mapper.select: SELECT k.item_id, k.phone, k.status, k.kill_time, i.name "item.name", i.number "item.number", i.create_time "item.create_time", i.start_time "item.start_time", i.end_time "item.end_time" FROM seckill k INNER JOIN secitem i ON i.item_id = k.item_id WHERE k.item_id=#{itemId} and k.phone=#{phone}
